definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: My happy place is Casa Dorada in Los Cabos, Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 我的樂土就在墨西哥的洛斯卡布斯。

sentences.english: Only loyalty can serve the country, no more land for home.
sentences.chinese: 只有精忠能報國，更無樂土可爲家。

sentences.english: For those who love bamboo, it is indeed heaven.
In times past the elephants were more successful than people.
sentences.chinese: 昔日，在這片樂土上大象可要比我們人類成就斐然。

sentences.english: From sullen earth sings hymns at heaven's gate;
sentences.chinese: 遠離這陰沉的世界，唱着聖歌，飛向那天堂的樂土。

sentences.english: Silicon Valley is company year great dream all the time is Elysian .
sentences.chinese: 硅谷一直是企業春秋大夢的樂土。

sentences.english: Think of each one as paradise in a photograph.
sentences.chinese: 照片上的每一處都可視爲天堂樂土。

sentences.english: Join BabyTV on a journey to explore and guess some of your favourite objects.
sentences.chinese: 參加寶物樂土的旅程來探究並猜一些你最喜歡的物件。

sentences.english: It's your office, your social center, your Cheers.
sentences.chinese: 它既是你的辦公室和社交中心，也是你的樂土。

sentences.english: Australia is known as the heaven for the villa designers.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞，別墅設計者的樂土。

definition: lit. as close as lips and teeth (idiom); closely related/interdependent

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
(fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
to surge like a gathering storm (idiom)/to grow by leaps and bounds
